event.description: Willie Bloomquist pops out to shortstop Troy Tulowitzki.
Aaron Hill singles on a line drive to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Jason Kubel called out on strikes.
Paul Goldschmidt walks. Aaron Hill to 2nd.
Geoff Blum grounds into a force out, third baseman Nolan Arenado to second baseman Marco Scutaro. Paul Goldschmidt out at 2nd.
Gerardo Parra strikes out swinging.
Matt Davidson flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Henry Blanco grounds out, second baseman Marco Scutaro to first baseman Ben Paulsen.
Pitcher Change: Josh Outman replaces Drew Pomeranz.
A. J. Pollock pops out to third baseman Nolan Arenado.
Willie Bloomquist singles on a line drive to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Aaron Hill grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Ben Paulsen. Willie Bloomquist to 2nd.
Jason Kubel grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Ben Paulsen.
Paul Goldschmidt walks.
Geoff Blum doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Gonzalez. Paul Goldschmidt to 3rd.
Gerardo Parra grounds out, third baseman Nolan Arenado to first baseman Ben Paulsen. Paul Goldschmidt scores.
Matt Davidson grounds out, second baseman Marco Scutaro to first baseman Ben Paulsen. Geoff Blum to 3rd.
Henry Blanco strikes out swinging.
Wil Nieves remains in the game as the catcher.
Pitcher Change: Rob Scahill replaces Josh Outman.
Defensive Substitution: Jamie Hoffmann replaces center fielder Dexter Fowler, batting 1st, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Chris Nelson replaces second baseman Marco Scutaro, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Tim Wheeler replaces left fielder Carlos Gonzalez, batting 3rd, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: DJ LeMahieu replaces shortstop Troy Tulowitzki, batting 4th, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Charlie Blackmon replaces right fielder Michael Cuddyer, batting 5th, playing right field.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Adam Eaton replaces Jason Kubel.
Paul Goldschmidt strikes out swinging.
With Geoff Blum batting, Adam Eaton caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Wil Nieves to shortstop DJ LeMahieu.
Geoff Blum grounds out, second baseman Chris Nelson to first baseman Chad Tracy.

Defensive switch from third base to first base for Brandon Wood.

Bobby Borchering strikes out swinging.
